title: Soy-Ginger Soup with Chicken
directions: Combine chicken, carrots, sherry (if you like), the 1 tablespoon soy sauce, the vinegar, ginger and black pepper in a 3-1/2- to 6-quart slow cooker. Stir in chicken broth and the water.
Cover; cook on high-heat setting for 2 to 3 hours. Stir in noodles and pea pods. Cover and cook for 3 minutes more.
To serve, ladle soup into bowls and serve with additional soy sauce.
ingredients: skinless, boneless chicken thighs, cut into 1-inch pieces
grated fresh ginger or 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger
